timeline.message:
Fix #286 (SemVer pre-release comparison)

* Fix wrong test case
* Also fix catching incorrect exception in test case

timeline.bodyText: IMO this shouldn't rely on parse exceptions, but check explicitly against the spec with a regex like 0|[1-9]\d*
timeline.author: sfPlayer1

replies.bodyText: How would one handle the exceptions then?
replies.author: Siphalor

replies.bodyText: Yes, thanks. Sorry for the delay, will move this forward soon.
replies.author: sfPlayer1
